<p align="center">
<i>A Flexible and Extensible fake data generator based on <strong>Pydantic</strong> models.</i>
</p>

<a href="https://pypi.org/project/pyfake/" target="_blank">

</p>

## Installation

```bash
pip install pyfake
```
